entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
